text: <@U2H3TT8F2> Its working with <meta name="description" content="{{ page_meta.meta_description }}"> this. please  use this instead of content.meta
thanks for looking into this <@UG52C29EE>

Does anyone know if anything is being done to introduce more of a WYSIWYG functionality (or at least allowing for image/media embedding) to HubDB? This is probably going to kill my ability to use the DB for dynamically generated resource pages for a client. It is definitely a strongly desired function for this particular individual.
if it's an embed from youtube or vimeo you could use a video id column that is just a simple text column. Then in the template it would build the full embed code using that video id.

For my use case, it is that they desire flexibility in the order of the internal content and the image/paragraph structure needs to be flexible in the same way as a WYSIWYG, as well as allowing for headers.
you may want to consider adding the ordering functionality into a custom module where the data is then powered by hubdb
or just not using hubdb and instead use a flex column

Hey all, I've a question in working within the constraints of the dynamic pages built out from parent/child tables. I have a use case where I need to be able to assign a unique CTA per child row.  Is there a way to achieve the embedding of a CTA using the hubL snippet and using a text field to enter the GUID for the unique CTA such as something like this?
```{% cta "my_cta" guid='{{ dynamic_page_hubdb_row.cta_guid }}' %}```
Did u try the above code? Did u get any errors for this code
that should work <@UDFTHC6PK>
I did try the above code... it doesn't seem to be pulling in the guid
and I get an empty CTA wrapper
...user error :face_palm:
The coffee never kicked in today
Welp that one is on me :joy: poor column ID translation.
Any of your HS folks -- are there plans to add a form selector and CTA selector as DB column options?
<@UDFTHC6PK> I  just tried the above code snippet and it renders the CTA properly for me. Can you DM me your template link and page details I will take a look
Hey <@UG52C29EE> -- I noted in the comment out of this that it was user error...had an ID mismatch.
Thank you for checking up on it though. Do you think you guys will try to get column types for HS CTAs and forms for DB at some point?
Need to plan for them. I will let u know once talk to the team here

Hi,
can we use column type "Foreign ID" as filter query? Have tried it before and it worked, but not anymore at this time.
` {% set qry = hubdb_table_rows(#######, "parent_category=soda") %} `
where parent_category is a Foreign ID colum type
